comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content:
Somebody really didn't like the state of this building - there are two other photos of it on Friday 4/10/1889 - 

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/state-records-nsw/3218427137/]

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/state-records-nsw/3218427207/]

I suppose that in 1889 it would have been a particular eyesore across the street from the newly completed Centennial Hall at Sydney Town Hall.
